entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Gogama
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:19 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. High zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
